Articles.Content:
Probably I missed something but it seems that after KSP 1.11 (after EVA construction was added) I cannot see the science reports stored in a module like the Hitchhiker and the Mobile Processing Lab. 

When I am on EVA and carry e. g. 4 science reports I store them in the module. The Kerbal on EVA "sees" the reports when I right-click the module. I get a menu item in the PAM showing "Take Data (4)". So far so good.

Then I switch to the module and the menu entry "Review stored data" is not shown. This is especially painful when I need to review the stored reports to line them up for processing in the lab. 

Is this a bug or is there a way to show the missing PAM entries?

Best, Shmauck

Edited May 7, 2021 by Shmauck
OMG. I had no pilot in a command module. I am dumb. Never mind.
